Size < functionality. Just don’t mess with what you don’t understand use your backup cache for now.

item.title: [Pi] Invisible Items [Pi]

item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Pure_:

Either their inventory model isn’t set correctly or their inventory model is ‘empty’. Just don’t compress it.

Gahh. I already did and it’s so much nicer now lol. It’s half the size of what it was.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Invisible Items [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, I have a 317 Pi and I recently compressed my cache and client and that messed up some of my models. It messed up all of the PvP models such as Statius, Zuriels, etc. But whenever I re-added them, they are invisible in the inventory, but when you equip them, it shows up perfect. I’m guessing the ints are wrong but I’m pretty sure these are right. What is the problem?

Example of one of the ints.

case 13887: itemDef.name = "Vesta's chainbody"; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.modelID = 42593; itemDef.modelZoom = 1440; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 545; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 2; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 5; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 4; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 42624; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 42644; itemDef.description = "Vesta's chainbody.".getBytes(); break;

Read full topic
